legal.title: Legal
legal.disclaimer: The text on this page is a temporary, simplified placeholder and does not constitute legal advice.

privacyPage.intro: Below you will find basic information about how we handle personal data in connection with RFQs and CNC manufacturing services.

sections.title: 1. Data controller
sections.body: The data controller is DakuTec s.r.o. (working name), registered office to be completed. This text is a placeholder and will be replaced after consultation with a legal professional.

sections.title: 2. What data we process
sections.body: We mainly process identification and contact details, technical documentation for your parts and our communication with you. The exact scope and legal bases will be added in the final version of the privacy policy.

sections.title: 3. Cookies and analytics
sections.body: The website currently uses only essential technical cookies necessary for its operation. Once we introduce analytics or marketing tools, this privacy and cookies section will be updated accordingly.

sections.title: 4. Your rights
sections.body: Under the GDPR you have rights such as access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing and others. The detailed description of how to exercise these rights will be provided in the final document.

termsPage.intro: Below you will find a basic working framework for cooperation on CNC machining and related services. This text is temporary and will later be replaced by full terms & conditions.

sections.title: 1. Scope of services
sections.body: DakuTec primarily provides CNC machining, CAM programming, fixture design and related technical consultancy. The exact scope is always defined in the quotation or purchase order.

sections.title: 2. Quotation and pricing
sections.body: Prices are set individually based on part complexity, material, tolerances and requested lead time. Each quotation is valid only for a limited period and may depend on receiving complete technical data.

sections.title: 3. Delivery times
sections.body: Delivery dates are indicative and may be affected by material availability, design changes and other factors. Detailed provisions regarding delays and contractual penalties will be added later.

sections.title: 4. Liability and quality
sections.body: We manufacture parts with a strong focus on accuracy, repeatability and traceability. Final wording regarding liability, warranty and claims handling will follow after legal review.

rfq.title: Request a Quote (RFQ)
rfq.thanksTitle: Thank you! We’ve received your request.
rfq.thanksSubtitle: We’ll get back to you shortly.
rfq.note: Attach a drawing or STEP/IGES and specify material, quantity, tolerance and desired lead time.
rfq.name: Full name
rfq.success: Thanks! We’ll reply soon with pricing and lead time.
rfq.error: Submission failed. Please try again or contact us by phone.

meta.description: Precision CNC machining, CAM programming and toolpath optimization. One-offs and small batches, Al/steel/stainless, tolerances down to ±0.01 mm.
meta.title: DakuTec

contact.title: Contact
contact.formNote: Need to attach drawings? Use our RFQ form.

hero.title: Precision CNC machining and custom CAM programming
hero.subtitle: One-offs and small batches • Aluminum / steel / stainless • Tolerances down to ±0.01 mm

services.title: Services
services.intro: Job machining, CAM programming and process optimisation – from first part to small series.

items.title: CNC milling
items.description: 3/4 axes, single parts & batches. Clean surfaces and stable tolerances.
items.description2: Aluminium, steel and stainless with focus on quality, repeatability and cycle time.
bullets: Tolerances down to ±0.01 mm (part & workholding dependent)
Al 6061/7075, steel, stainless, brass, engineering plastics

items.title: CNC turning
items.description: Rotational components, threads and accurate shoulders.
items.description2: Turning stainless steel and aluminium with clean finishes and tight dimensions.

items.title: CAM programming
items.title2: Programs for fast and safe production
items.description: Fusion 360 / SolidCAM – 3+2/5-axis strategies, simulations, post processors.
items.description2: Toolpath creation & optimisation, postprocessor setup, tool libraries and collision simulation.

items.title: Prototyping
items.description: Functional samples, workholding fixtures and small series.
items.description2: Support from first prototype to repeatable fixture. Iterations and changes included.
bullets: Short lead times, clear change communication

items.title: Toolpath optimisation
items.description: Better strategies = less vibration, cleaner surfaces, shorter times.
items.description2: We refine programs and strategies for stability, quality and reduced wear.

items.title: Measurement & quality
items.description2: Measurement reports, material certs and photo documentation on request.
